Hi, I'm Stan, sometimes referred to as stanistan.

Formerly at Etsy, where I worked on lots of things as a Software Engineer & Product Infrastructure Architect; an alumn of the Recurse Center; and a perpetual work in progress.

You can find some of my work on github.

If you want to get in touch, I'm on twitter (quietly), or you can email me at: stan at stanistan .com
